sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function TweetCard({ tweet }) { return (
{tweet.user?.name} @{tweet.user?.email?.split("@")[0]} ¬∑ {new Date(tweet.createdAt).toLocaleString()}
{tweet.text}
{tweet.audioUrl && ( )} {tweet.videoUrl && (
Pinch or double-tap to zoom, swipe to seek.
)}
); }
